short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate, Sort, Track and Search your video playlists for efficient watching. Perfect for Students, Creators, and Binge-watchers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Playlist Guru

🎥 Features:
•  🖱️  Instantly Find any playlist duration with only one click
• 📊 Sort Videos by Duration, Views, Date Title, Channel or Index
• 🕒 Track Watching Progress: Time Left and Watched Percentage
• 🔍 Search Videos by Title within a Playlist
• ⚡ Adjust Watching Speed to Estimate Completion Time

🎯 Use Cases:
• 📅 Plan your video watching schedule effectively
• 🔝 Easily find specific videos in large playlists
• ⌛ Maximize your learning or entertainment time with speed adjustments
• 📈 Track your progress on educational playlists

👥 For Whom:
• Students and educators
• Content creators and video marketers
• Avid learners and binge-watchers
